Contents of text block. Supports markdow:
I am a joint author of 3 journal articles {41 total citations} in biochemistry and molecular biology. I have worked as a researcher at the Queensland Alliance for Agriculture and Food Innovation, the Centre for Advanced Imaging and the Australian Centre for Ecogenomics based at the University of Queensland, and the Department of Plant Sciences at the Univeristy of Oxford. I have also constructed a [4000 line analytical dashboard](https://github.com/zooniverse/zoo-stats-api-graphql) with underlying database during an internship with [Zooniverse](https://www.zooniverse.org/) and I am currently completing a DPhil on bacterial chemotaxis at the University of Oxford funded by a Clarendon Award.

I am currently searching for a Postdoctoral Researcher position in microbiology, molecular biology and genomics. I am particularly interested in using my programming skills for automated statistics and image analysis.
I have found that engaging the public with my science has been both rewarding and important for improving public perceptions of science.
I enjoy helping students on their journey from their current state of knowledge to new and deeper understanding about a topic.
